alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore; Lee; Macon; Russell; Shelby; Tallapoosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Heat Advisory issued August 11 at 12:10PM CDT until August 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 107. For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 111 expected. * WHERE...Shelby, Chilton, Coosa, Tallapoosa, Autauga, Elmore, Macon, Lee and Russell Counties. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 9 PM CDT this evening. For the Excessive Heat Warning, from 10 AM to 9 PM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. When possible reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear lightweight and loose fitting clothing when possible. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Autauga; Chilton; Coosa; Elmore; Lee; Macon; Russell; Shelby; Tallapoosa
